channel.title: RevMetrix on Hugo Relearn Theme
channel.description: Recent content in RevMetrix on Hugo Relearn Theme

item.title: Current State of RevMetrix
item.description: RevMetrix System Architecture Current Status by Development Team Backend - Current StateAll details about the current state of the backend development, along with what is planned for the future Frontend - Current StateAll details about the current state of the frontend development, along with what is planned for the future Simulation - Current StateAll details about the current state of simulation development, along with what is planned for the future

item.title: How To Contribute
item.description: Table of Contents Contributing DocumentationHow to add, edit, and remove documentation on the Wiki DigitalOcean ManagementInformation regarding how to manage DigitalOcean Droplets Dockerizing an ApplicationInformation on how to dockerize a project and deploy onto a separate machine or server Getting StartedInformation regarding setting up your development enviroment GitHub WorkflowsAll GitHub workflows for the project Linking DomainsHow to link domains to an application using DNS records and Nginx Proxy Manager RevMetrix WebAPIInformation on how to use the WebAPI

item.title: Initial Project Ideas
item.description: Original System Architecture Backend - Database ArchitectureUML diagrams representing the initial database architecture and schemas Phone App - Proof of ConceptDrawing board ideas for the layout and interaction methods of the phone application Simulation - First ThoughtsThe base ideas around using Unity for the development of a bowling simulation

item.title: Project Assignments
item.description: Overview Below you can find the list of semesters that RevMetrix was under development and their respective assignments and details. Development Semesters Fall 2023A list of all assignments completed throughout the fall 2023 semester Spring 2024A list of all assignments completed throughout the spring 2024 semester

item.title: Project Milestones
item.description: Overview Below you can find the assignment descriptions for each of the project’s semester milestones. There are three in total per semester, and once the assignment date has passed, the appropriate slideshow can be seen under each milestone’s title. Milestones Fall 2023The progress made prior to each project milestone during the fall 2023 semester Spring 2024The progress made prior to each project milestone during the spring 2024 semester

item.title: SmartDot
item.description: ISmartDot InterfaceInformation about the ISmartDot interface SmartDot HardwareInformation about the SmartDot hardware SmartDot SimulatorInformation about the SmartDot Simulator

item.title: Technologies Used
item.description: Overview Below you’ll find a list of all the technologies necessary for making contributions to the RevMetrix project. Technologies IDE’s Name Version Download Link JetBrains Rider 2023.2.3 Download JetBrains WebStorm 2023.3.4 Download Microsoft Visual Studio 2022 Community 17.7.5 Download Frameworks and tools Database Engines Name Version Download Link Microsoft SQL Server Developer 16.0.1000.6 Download SQL Server Management Studio 19 19.1 Download Design Tools Name Version Download Link Draw.io 21.6.8 Download Game Engine Name Version Download Link Unity Hub - Download Unity 2023.
